description:
Forge starts off a little nervous, but he doesn't seem to look a bunch at the video playing for him.
As usual, they energy gets turned up during the rimming section. Wonder how many straight guys never get to experience having their ass eaten-out? They are sure missing out on major erogenous zone!
Glenn still struggles to make guys nut, but I find having the guys drop their load onto his face works great...if their aim is good. Forge's aim is a little off, despite Glenn having his mouth wide open as a baby chick.
Forge is a hot guy, but not sure he is down for more, so enjoy this oral video!
title: Forge & Glenn - Serviced
